did.unittitle: Olive Hill Factory workers benefit concerts

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reel World String Band played for a benefit for the Olive Hill Factory Workers on July 4, 1979 at Carter Caves State Park, Kentucky and on August 4, 1979 in Ashland, Kentucky. Songwriter Mary Lou (Layne) Chandler wrote Thread of Justice and Evergreen as tributes to these striking women workers. Both songs are on Reel World's first album.
